UpdateSourceArgs: -c 'cd space-station14/server && download_url=$(curl -s https://cdn.centcomm.spacestation14.com/builds/wizards/manifest.json | jq -r ".builds | to_entries | last | .value.server.\"linux-x64\".url") && curl -sLOJ "$download_url" && unzip -qo SS14.Server_linux-x64.zip && rm -rf SS14.Server_linux-x64.zip'

-c 'cd space-station14/server && download_url=$(curl -s https://cdn.centcomm.spacestation14.com/builds/wizards/manifest.json | jq -r ".builds | to_entries | last | .value.server.\"linux-arm64\".url") && curl -sLOJ "$download_url" && unzip -qo SS14.Server_linux-arm64.zip && rm -rf SS14.Server_linux-arm64.zip'

/C start powershell.exe -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -WindowStyle Hidden -Command "cd space-station14/server; Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'https://github.com/stedolan/jq/releases/download/jq-1.6/jq-win64.exe' -OutFile 'jq.exe'; $download_url = Invoke-Expression -Command 'curl -s https://cdn.centcomm.spacestation14.com/builds/wizards/manifest.json | jq.exe -r ''.builds | to_entries | last | .value.server.\"win-x64\".url'''; Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $download_url -OutFile 'SS14.Server_win-x64.zip'; Expand-Archive -Path 'SS14.Server_win-x64.zip' -DestinationPath .; Remove-Item 'SS14.Server_win-x64.zip'"
